hero.subheadline: Leading business training and mentoring institution to equip you with practical strategies from experienced mentors.

about.title: Building a Resilient Entrepreneurial Ecosystem
about.description: Sekolah Mentor Indonesia (SMI) is a training institution focused on empowering human resources through practical curriculum and intensive mentoring.
about.visi_desc: To be a center of excellence in business training that produces competent mentors and entrepreneurs.
about.misi_desc: To provide practical strategies and a relevant mindset to face modern business challenges.
about.history_p1: Founded on November 27, 2023, as part of PT. Multiusaha Prioritas Bersama.
about.history_p2: SMI exists as an empowerment pillar to help business partners achieve maximum growth through specialized work training.
about.history_p3: We believe that with the right mentor, every business potential can be accelerated effectively and sustainably.

programs.title: Practical Curriculum for Real Results
programs.description: Training materials specifically designed to have a direct impact on your business development.

mindset.title: Business Mindset
mindset.desc: Building a resilient entrepreneurial mental foundation to face market dynamics.

sales.title: Sales Excellence
sales.desc: Practical sales strategies to increase conversion and revenue growth.

leadership.title: Leadership & Team
leadership.desc: The art of managing people and building solid teams for business acceleration.

system.title: Business System
system.desc: Building stable operational systems so the business can run effectively.

advantages.title: Trusted Partner for Business Growth
advantages.description: We are here to provide real solutions for entrepreneurs who want to scale up with high competency standards.

mentor.title: Practitioner Mentor
mentor.desc: Guided directly by business players who have been proven in the field.

curriculum.title: Applicable Curriculum
curriculum.desc: Materials focus on real implementation, not just academic theory.

mentoring.title: Intensive Mentoring
mentoring.desc: We mentor your business growth process step by step.

ecosystem.title: Synergy Ecosystem
ecosystem.desc: Access to a wide network of business partners to accelerate collaboration.

testimonials.title: What They Say?
testimonials.description: Real stories from alumni who have transformed with Sekolah Mentor Indonesia.

cta.title: Accelerate Your Business Growth Now
cta.description: Optimize your potential and business through intensive mentoring and a practical curriculum specially designed for superior entrepreneurs.

features.title: Complete Features for Best Experience
features.description: Enjoy various premium features specifically designed to support your journey as a content creator.

interactive.title: Interactive Classes
interactive.description: High-quality learning videos with easy-to-understand materials

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join thousands of other creators in a supportive community

certificate.title: Official Certificate
certificate.description: Get certificates that can enhance your professional credibility

benefits.title: Benefits of Joining SMI
benefits.description: Get various exclusive benefits that you won't find on other platforms.

mentor.title: Experienced Mentors
mentor.description: Learn directly from experts who have been successful in their field

flexible.title: Flexible Time
flexible.description: Access materials anytime and anywhere according to your schedule

portfolio.title: Portfolio Development
portfolio.description: Help build a strong portfolio for your career

network.title: Wide Networking
network.description: Expand your network connections with the creative industry

products.title: Featured Programs for Content Creators
products.description: Choose the program that suits your needs and level to develop your career in content creation.

basic.title: Basic Course
basic.description: Basic content creation materials for beginners who want to start a career in the digital world.

advanced.title: Advanced Program
advanced.description: Intensive program for creators who want to improve their skills to a professional level.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.description: Personal guidance from experienced mentors to accelerate your career.

footer.description: A holding company building a sustainable and innovative business ecosystem through the synergy of various strategic business units.
